document_data.name: Chalannos Firehawk
document_data.mainbody: '''Chalannos "the Masked" Firehawk''' was a retired [[adventurer]] living in the city of [[Wheloon]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activity: After having retired as an adventurer, Chalannos took up the life of an instructor for other warriors. He was considered to be an expert trainer, able to teach his students how to use any particular weapon. His fees were several [[gold piece]]s, although he would also accept payment in the form of any [[magical item]] that he could make use of.
document_data.History: Chalannos had retired to a cottage that stood on a lane on the northeastern edge of Wheloon by [[1358 DR]].
